joyee.name: Joyee Cheung
joyee.bio:
I'm a developer at Alibaba Cloud working on alinode, an application management solution for Node.js, which provides services for Node.js application monitoring, profiling, alerting, security warning .etc, and has been used both inside and outside the Alibaba Group. We also help to improve the Node.js developer experience on the Alibaba Cloud.
In my free time, I am also a Node.js core collaborator, making contributions to the Node.js core and other related projects.

brn.name: 青野 健利
brn.bio:
株式会社サイバーエージェント・アドテクスタジオで主にフロントエンドを担当しています。
言語はjavascript以外にもC++・Rust等も好きです。趣味でV8エンジンのコードを追っています。

rachel.name: Rachel White
rachel.bio: Rachel is currently a Technical Evangelist at Microsoft, but is also a self-taught programmer & occasional artist. She is currently working on multiple video game projects, a VR cat cafe, and thinking about what IoT devices she can build for her two black cats. Her other interests include glitch art, 80s horror, and indie games. Her aesthetic is fog machines, laser lights, and broken VHS tapes.
